features: 【Excellent Karaoke Sound】Portable karaoke machine is equipped with 2* 15W premium full-range speakers, crisp highs, accurate mids, and deep bass, which experience rich, vibrant, and lifelike sounds. Realize all-around surround sound, giving you shocking audio-visual effects.Perfect for parties, family karaoke, weddings, gatherings outdoor/indoor activities.A perfect Christmas gift for kids & adults.

【All-in-one Bluetooth Speaker System】Multi-function portable PA system features the latest Bluetooth 5.0 chip, ensuring seamless connectivity with smartphones/tablets for music playback.It functions as a Karaoke machine and Bluetooth speaker, allowing you to host music parties anytime. It is an ideal choice for home karaoke.

【Upgrade Dual Wireless UHF Microphones】This wireless microphone is designed with advanced active noise reduction technology, a professional DSP audio processor, and the EQ chip to auto-adjust treble and bass. Stable and reliable signal while you are singing and no worries about cutting off. Every word from you will be perfect!It would be connected automatically when both are turned on, An ideal gift choice for your kids who fall in love with performance and music for speech or singing.

【Easy & Play to Go】Portable karaoke machine's built-in powerful battery could give you up to 4-6 hours of playtime, Besides, the speaker works as a charging station, and the USB port enables the power bank function to recharge your smartphone.It weighs 1.96 kg and is Light, portable, and compact.You can easy to carry it to wherever the fun is which is the perfect choice for parties, beaches, weddings, gathering outdoor&indoor activities.

【Make It A Duet】Long press the "A= B" key for 2 seconds to switch the "CHA" and "CHB" frequency bands. When the two microphones are in the "CHA" and "CHB" frequency bands respectively, the microphone can be a duo. When both microphones are in the same frequency band, only one microphone can be used.Sing sweet solos and duets with Two wireless microphones.Besides, A phone or tablet stand is prepared for you intimately: supports Devices up to 3.9 inches.

【Multiple Connectivity &Bluetooth 5.0】Karaoke machines easy connectivity via Bluetooth 5.0/USB Port/MicroSD Card by many external devices like iPhones, Android mobile phones, iPad, TV, PC, etc. Via AUX cable or RCA cable can be used for TV connection and sync lyrics, allowing you to enjoy the ultimate home karaoke machine.

【Colorful Disco Lights】There are shining and color-shifting LED lights on the front of the karaoke speaker,Press the 'LED' button to turn on /off all lights with one click.It has 3 light modes (pulsating to music, color gradient,and flashing)which can change color with the beat of the music.Not only will it light up the room but also The colorful LED lights create a pleasant and romantic party vibe for you.It allows you to use it conveniently on both formal and casual occasions.

【Volume Control】When your device is connected to the speaker, you can adjust the volume of the music through the volume rotary button of the speaker. At the same time, the volume of your device connected to the speaker can also affect music sound.If the volume of your device is low or turned off, This will cause the music played through the speaker to be very low.

【LSMOEO STORE Promise】Providing high-quality products has always been our goal, 6 monthly warranty and friendly,easy-to-reach technical support make your purchase guaranteed.The package comes with a karaoke machine,2*wireless handheld microphones, 1* charging cable, 1* AUX cables, 2*Microphone covers, and a user manu.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LSMOEO Portable Karaoke Machine for Adults and Kids with 2 UHF Wireless Microphones All-In-One Bluetooth Sound System Versatile sound system with a multifunction device as a karaoke machine, portable PA system, and Bluetooth music speaker. DSP chip inside the machine will achieve full-range surround stereo sound. Built-in large compatible 2000mAh rechargeable batteries inside the speaker which can be played lasting for up to 4-6 hours. The professional karaoke machine creates fun and lasting singing moments for you. Come to a karaoke carnival party at home, in the garden, or outdoors anytime, anywhere! Easy To Use - Whoever You Are Be a Vocal Star ! The karaoke machine supports TF Card/USB drive/AUX IN. Compatible with all your favorite external devices, such as iPhone, Android phone, iPad, TV, PC, etc. AUX cable or RCA cable can be used for TV connection and sync lyrics. The separate button switches control LED lights and switch 7 kinds of lights at will, for you to create a pleasant and romantic karaoke party atmosphere.

Double Powerful Speaker, 360° Stereo Quality Sound LSMOEO karaoke speaker is built-in 2*15W full-range speakers, equipped with high-performance audio drivers and advanced digital signal processors, automatic adjustment of a high and low base, intelligent noise reduction, making the sound clearer and softer, and the bass stronger, amplifies its volume without distorting audio, even at higher volumes.

2 wireless UHF microphones The two microphones adopt the latest UHF technology, and the signal is stable when singing. When both the speaker and microphone are turned on, the microphone will automatically connect and have a working range of up to 33 feet. The 2 microphones adopt advanced intelligent noise reduction technology, and the professional audio processor automatically adjusts the high and low sounds to ensure better performance. Efficiently transmits your voice with fidelity and noise reduction for the best possible sound. The microphone has individual adjustment buttons to give you more personalized options. This wireless microphone is designed with advanced active noise reduction technology, a professional DSP audio processor, and the EQ chip to auto-adjust treble and bass. Stable and reliable signal while you are singing and no worries about cutting off. Every word from you will be perfect! It would be connected automatically when both are turned on, An ideal gift choice for your kids who fall in love with performance and music for speech or singing. Note: Do not point the microphone at the speaker to avoid howling. The volume adjustment key of the device connected to the speaker can also adjust the sound of the speaker. If the sound of your speaker is very low, please check your connected device and turn up the sound of the device.

The two microphones adopt the latest UHF and advanced intelligent noise reduction technology, and the signal is stable when singing. Two microphones are equipped with 400mAh rechargeable batteries, which can run for up to 6 hours on a full charge. Wireless microphones for karaoke each have individual displays; adjust volume, echo, & EQ for perfect karaoke pitch control. Original vocal elimination With the function of "original vocal elimination", you can freely remove the original vocal, and switch the original vocal to the accompaniment, and the original vocal of the music will be weakened, allowing you to indulge in your own music time.

Independent button to switch light You can turn on the lights, turn off the lights, and switch the light color at will. 6 colors of light effects create a pleasant and romantic karaoke party atmosphere for you.
Bring joy to your family An ideal gift choice for your kids who fall in love with performance and music for speech or singing.

Qusetion 1：How to charge the microphones? There are two ways to charge: 1. Use the included charging cable to plug into the DC 5V charging port on the bottom of the microphone to charge. 2. When the speaker is plugged into the DC power supply, the microphone can be directly placed in the microphone slot on the speaker to be charged. Qusetion 2 ： Why is my speaker sound low? The sound of the music depends not only on the speaker's volume adjustment buttons but also on the volume of your device connected to the speaker, which means the source of the music! Question 3： Why can't two microphones work at the same time? When both microphones are on CH01 or CH02 at the same time (note the numbers on the display), Only one microphone works. When you need two microphones to work together, you need to adjust one microphone to CH01 and the other to CH02, only when the two microphones are in the different channels will work together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sing, Dance, and Shine with the Ultimate Karaoke Party Machine
reviews.reviewText: Unleash Your Inner Superstar with the All-in-One Karaoke MachineWhether you're a seasoned karaoke enthusiast or a complete novice, this all-encompassing karaoke machine is sure to unleash your inner superstar and transform any gathering into an unforgettable night of singing, dancing, and pure fun. Equipped with two UHF wireless microphones, a powerful PA speaker system, and dazzling LED party lights, this portable powerhouse has everything you need to create a captivating karaoke experience that will have everyone belting out their favorite tunes.Sing, Dance, and Shine with the Ultimate Karaoke Party MachinePicture this: the thrill of belting out your favorite tunes, the infectious energy of a crowd singing along, and the captivating ambiance of mesmerizing LED lights. The Karaoke Machine for Adults and Kids is the ultimate party machine, designed to ignite the night with its stellar sound quality, versatile features, and captivating visual effects. Whether you're hosting a house party, a backyard barbecue, or an impromptu sing-along, this karaoke machine will transform any occasion into an unforgettable celebration of music and laughter.Transform Your Home into a Karaoke Haven with This Portable PowerhouseDitch the expensive karaoke bars and create your very own karaoke haven in the comfort of your home with this portable powerhouse. This compact yet powerful karaoke machine packs a punch, delivering exceptional sound quality and a vibrant atmosphere that rivals any professional setup. With its convenient portability and versatile features, you can take the party with you anywhere, whether it's a picnic in the park, a road trip adventure, or a cozy night in with friends and family.**Features and Highlights:*** Two UHF wireless microphones for uninterrupted singing and duets* Powerful PA speaker system for clear, crisp sound reproduction* Dazzling LED party lights that create an immersive karaoke experience* Bluetooth connectivity for streaming music from your smartphone or tablet* Multiple playback options, including USB, AUX, and TF card input* Rechargeable battery for portable karaoke fun on the go* Lightweight and compact design for easy portability* Suitable for indoor and outdoor useStrengths:* Exceptional sound quality with impressive volume* Versatile playback options for endless karaoke possibilities* Captivating LED party lights that set the mood* Two wireless microphones for shared singing experiences* Rechargeable battery for long-lasting karaoke sessions* Lightweight and portable design for convenient transport**Weaknesses:*** Microphone range could be slightly extended for larger spaces* Some users may find the LED lights too bright* Vocal effects could be more diverseOverall Summary:The Karaoke Machine for Adults and Kids is a fantastic choice for karaoke enthusiasts of all ages and skill levels. Its exceptional sound quality, versatile features, and captivating LED party lights make it the perfect party starter, transforming any gathering into an unforgettable night of singing, dancing, and pure fun. With its portable design and long-lasting battery, you can take the karaoke party with you anywhere, whether it's a backyard barbecue, a road trip adventure, or a cozy night in with friends and family. Whether you're a seasoned karaoke pro or a complete novice, this all-in-one karaoke machine is sure to unleash your inner superstar and create memories that will last a lifetime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get's the party started!
reviews.reviewText: We love to entertain. My daughter also loves to sing. So picking up the LSMOEO Karaoke Machine was a no brainer. It is compact, super fun, and very easy to use. When you and your friends aren't singing your hearts out, this is a nice wireless speaker too!This unit is very easy to set up. A USB cord is included that charges the speaker and the two mics simultaneously. It takes about 2.5 hours to fully charge, and that charge lasts several hours. I have only charged this once, and it has been used countless times since. The speaker has a nice weight to it, but is easy to move around. With the exception of the volume knob, all buttons and controls are on the back of the speaker. This gives it a very sleek look and really let's the 4 different light modes dazzle. The two mics are great quality. They are mid-weight, have thier own on/off, volume and reverb buttons and each come with an optional foam cover. They can be used together or seperate. The mics can be charged seperate (via USB) from the speaker, or they sit securly in the space on top of the speaker where they also charge.I like that there are several different modes for music. You can connect a device via bluetooth or with the included aux cord. You can also use a thumb drive or a memory card. The speaker quality is very crisp, clear and it can get quite loud too (mic volume is controlled seperate via individual mic). The only thing that doesn't really work great is the button on the speaker that is supposed to "mute the original singers voice". All ot really does is make the music fuzzy sounding. But with a karaoke version of almost every imaginable song on YouTube, this feature isn't really something that is needed anyways. I have also used the speaker alone, as it is a convient, wireless and easy way to play music from my phone.Overall, this set is excellent. Great for parties, kids, presentations, or just screaming at your kids in the morning to wake up and get moving, the LSMOEO Karaoke Machine is a machine I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So many features all in one!
reviews.reviewText: This is an amazing device for any home party. It's not just a karaoke machine, though it has two cordless mics with multiple controls and a great sound used alone or as a duet. It can also be used a a bluetooth speaker and a PA. You can connect it with a variety of external devices, including your TV to synch with lyrics. Plus, it sets a great atmosphere with the LED lights which work independently, so you can also turn them off if you prefer.I love that is it easily portable and can be recharged for cordless use. It also works as a charging station. However, you can also charge the machine and microphones independently with the included cable. They really designed this smartly for fun and convenience. Any one one the included features would make it a great add to your party, but this one has it all. Highly recommended.
